pli-tv-pvr2.6:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.1: (1) When it comes to the offenses for a lustful nun consenting to a lustful man making physical contact with her, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:1.2: They are legal issues arising from an offense. …
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.1: (8) When it comes to the offenses for asking for curd and then eating it, to which of the four kinds of legal issues do they belong?
pli-tv-pvr2.6:2.3: it is the legal question concerning offences.
pli-tv-pvr2.6:3.1: Concluded is the Sixth Chapter: on Legal Questions
